name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an accomplished Backend Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in creating high-performance applications using **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **Fastify**, and **PostgreSQL**. My technical expertise includes hands-on proficiency with **Zod**, **Redis**, and containerization tools like **Docker**, which I leverage to build robust backend systems. I have a strong background in implementing **CI/CD** automation and infrastructure management with **Terraform**. 
In addition to my core backend skills, I bring experience in A/B testing, data manipulation with **Pandas**, and advanced analytics utilizing **Polars**. I have developed enterprise-grade platforms within the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with critical standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. With a solid grasp of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I am committed to delivering secure, scalable, and efficient applications.
